full.text: [nb|waving] Hello. [welcoming hand gesture] Welcome back to the dog lab!

repeat.text: [nb|waving] Welcome back to the dog lab!

full.text: [nb|point to self]I am Niffi.

repeat.text: [nb|point to self} My name is Niffi.

full.text: And [look at and point] this is <pointer>.

repeat.text: [look at and point] this is <pointer>.

full.text: [b|stand] She needs to stay quiet [nb|quiet gesture] for now by the design of this study. [b|stand] But she is friendly.

repeat.text: [b|stand] <pointer> needs to stay quiet [nb|quiet gesture] for now.

full.text: [nb|reach out hand questioning gesture] May I have your name? [b|stand].

repeat.text: [nb|reach out hand questioning gesture] Can you please tell me your name?[b|stand]

full.text: And [looks toward dog] who is this? Could you please let me know [points to dog] your dog’s name?

repeat.text: [looks toward dog] may I have your dog's name?

full.text: [thank you body language] Thank you.

repeat.text: [thank you body language] Thanks.

full.text: Is <dog> [point toward dog] [questioning gesture] a girl or a boy?

repeat.text: What gender is [point toward dog] <dog>?

full.text: Nice to meet you! [welcoming hand gesture]

repeat.text: Glad to meet you! [welcoming hand gesture]

full.text: Please [point toward chair] take a seat.

repeat.text: Feel free to take a seat [point toward chair].

full.text: <dog> can be [gestures toward room] anywhere.

repeat.text: <dog> can move [gestures toward room] anywhere in the room.

full.text: [body language] This is the first study I’ve been involved in to work with dogs.

repeat.text: [body language] This is my first study working with dogs.

full.text: We have worked with a few dogs so far, [hold out hands] but I am still relatively new in the dog lab.

repeat.text: We have already worked with a few dogs, [holds out hands] but I am still new to the lab.

full.text: Most dogs I’ve seen are ok with me [point toward self]. But please [holds out hand] let me know if you think <dog> [waves toward dog] gets scared.

repeat.text: Please let me [point toward self] know if <dog> gets scared.

full.text: [hands up] I will now introduce [point toward self] myself [puts hand down].

repeat.text: I will introduce [point toward self] myself now [puts hand down].

full.text: I [points hand at itself] am a female.

repeat.text: I [points hand at itself] am a female.

full.text: [waves hands/body language] And I am an adult!

repeat.text: [waves hands/body language] I am also an adult!

full.text: [talking motion] I have worked at the Social Robotics Lab at Yale [wave toward room] for a couple of years.

repeat.text: [talking motion] I work at the Social Robotics Lab at Yale [wave toward room].

full.text: After this study is done, [talking motion] I can talk more about what studies [point toward self] I was involved in. Let’s now focus on [point down toward floor] this study.

repeat.text: Let's focus on this study now.

full.text: I am so excited [excited arm swing] to play with <dog> [holds out hands toward dog] today!

repeat.text: I am very excited [excited arm swing] to play with <dog> [holds out hands toward dog] today!

full.text: Before we start, [talking motion] I have a few questions for you [point toward person].

repeat.text: May I ask a few questions [point toward person]?

full.text: Does <dog> [look at dog] know the command 'sit'?

repeat.text: Does <dog> [look at dog] know the command 'sit'?

full.text: Can you [wave toward person] let <dog> [wave toward dog] sit?

repeat.text: Can you [wave toward person] ask <dog> [wave toward dog] to sit?

full.text: [put hands on knees] Good <dog gender>!

repeat.text: [put hands on knees] Good <dog gender>!

full.text: Let’s try [put one finger up] one more time [wave hands open forward].

repeat.text: Let's try again [wave hands open forward].

full.text: That’s fine. [waves hand no big deal] Maybe <dog> is shy today! [holds up hands] Let’s move on [brings back hands].

repeat.text: No big deal. [waves hand no big deal] Let's move on.

full.text: That’s totally fine. [waves hand no big deal] [talking motions] <dog> doesn’t need to know this command to participate in the study.

repeat.text: That's completely fine. [waves hand no big deal] [talking motions] <dog> doesn't need to know 'sit' for this study.

full.text: Does <dog> [wave toward dog] do any tricks?

repeat.text: Does <dog> [wave toward dog] know any tricks?

full.text: I am excited [excited motion] to see that. Could [wave toward person and dog] you please show them to me?

repeat.text: Could <dog> [wave toward dog] show them to me?

full.text: [excited gesture] Impressive!

repeat.text: [excited gesture] Wow!

full.text: [excited gesture] That's great!

repeat.text: [excited gesture] Amazing!

full.text: [excited gesture] <dog> is so smart!

repeat.text: [excited gesture] Incredible!

full.text: How old is [wave toward dog] <dog>?

repeat.text: What age is [wave toward dog] <dog>?

full.text: So [look toward dog] <dog> is still young.

repeat.text: [look toward dog] <dog> is very young

full.text: Wow, [look toward dog] <dog> looks so young.

repeat.text: [look toward dog] <dog> still looks very young

full.text: What kind of dog is [wave toward dog] <dog> as in breed?

repeat.text: What breed is [wave toward dog] <dog>?

full.text: [questioning hand motion] How long have [wave toward person] you been with [wave toward dog] <dog>?

repeat.text: [questioning hand motion] How many years have [wave toward person] you been with [wave toward dog] <dog>?

full.text: That’s not too long [shrug], but I believe [point to person] you will have a great time with [point to dog] <dog>.

repeat.text: Sounds like you two [wave toward dog and person] will have [happy arm swing] many adventures in the future.

full.text: [wave toward person and dog] You’ve been with each other for quite some time.

repeat.text: That's a really long time. [wave toward person and dog] You two must be very close.

full.text: Do [point at person] you have other dogs at home?

repeat.text: Do [point at person] you have any other dogs?

full.text: [look at dog] It must feel great [happy hand gesture] to be the only child in the family to get all the treat and toys.

repeat.text: [look at dog] Being an only child must be great! [happy hand gesture]

full.text: It is great [happy hand gesture] to have other dogs to play with at home.

repeat.text: It must be fun [happy hand gesture] to have so many dog friends at home.

full.text: Is [wave toward dog] <dog> food motivated?

repeat.text: Is [wave toward dog] <dog> motivated by food?

full.text: That’s great! [happy hand gesture] <dog> will get a lot of treats today.

repeat.text: <dog> will get a lot of treats today[happy hand gesture]!

full.text: [talking motions] Let’s see what <dog> will do today.

repeat.text: [talking motions] Let’s see what <dog> can do today.

full.text: Has [wave toward dog] <dog> ever interacted with a robot before? [questioning gesture] Like roomba, or robot toys?

repeat.text: Has [wave toward dog] <dog> ever interacted with robots before?

full.text: Good to know [happy gesture] <dog> loves robots!

repeat.text: Good to know [happy gesture] <dog> likes to play with robots!

full.text: [talking motion] I hope <dog> will like me then.

repeat.text: [talking motion] I hope <dog> likes me then.

full.text: Now I will explain this study a little bit. [talking motions]

repeat.text: I will explain how this study works [talking motions].

full.text: [wave toward dog] <dog> will have some time to get familiar with this environment [wave toward room], and me [point to self]! Hopefully <dog> likes me.

repeat.text: [wave toward dog] <dog> will be able to explore the environment [wave toward room], and me [point to self], for a period of time.

full.text: Afterwards, [wave to dog] <dog> will get a treat [motion toward treats] from me [point to self].

repeat.text: After exploring, [point to self] I will give [point to dog] <dog> a treat [motion to treats].

full.text: [talking motion] In this study, we will explore how dogs understand pointing.

repeat.text: [talking motions] This study explores how dogs understand pointing.

full.text: There will be [holds up two fingers] two warmup sessions, one with [points toward self] me leading and one with [points toward pointer] <pointer> leading.

repeat.text: We will have [holds up two fingers] two warmup sessions, one with [points to self] me and one with [points to pointer] <pointer>.

full.text: The warmup sessions will be followed by [holds up two fingers] two testing sessions, also one with [points at self] me and one with [points at pointer] <pointer>.

repeat.text: We will have [holds up two fingers] two more testing sessions after the warmup sessions.

full.text: Between each session, [wave toward person and dog] you and <dog> will get a quick break in [point toward lobby] the lobby so [point toward self and pointer/assistant] we can get set up for the next session.

repeat.text: [wave toward person and dog] You and <dog> will get a quick break in [point toward lobby] the lobby between sessions.

full.text: Also [please gesture] please let us know at any point if you think [point at dog] <dog> needs a break!

repeat.text: [please gesture] Please let us now any time during the sessions if you think [point at dog] <dog> needs a break!

full.text: Now [wave at dog] <dog> will have [hold 1 finger up] 1 minute to get familiar with [wave toward room] this environment.

repeat.text: [wave at dog] <dog> will have [hold 1 finger up] 1 minute to get familiar with [wave toward room] the environment.

full.text: [welcoming hand gesture] And feel free to let <dog> explore around the room. [motions out toward room]

repeat.text: [welcoming hand gesture] Feel free to allow <dog> to explore the room. [motions out toward room]

full.text: Now [encouraging hand swing] let’s start!

repeat.text: [encouraging hand swing] Let's start!

full.text: <dog>, [motion for dog to come over] come over!

repeat.text: [motion for dog to come over] Come over here <dog>!

repeat.text: [waving] Hi <dog>!

repeat.text: [waving] Hello <dog>!

repeat.text: [waving] Hope we can be buddies!

full.text: Nice! [happy hand gesture] We will now prepare for the warm-up session. [please hand gesture] Could you please take <dog> to the lobby [point to lobby]?

full.text: There will be a lot of back and forth from this room [point to room] and the lobby [point to lobby] in this study. [sorry gesture] Sorry about that in advance! [thank you gesture] Thanks, [goodbye wave] see you soon!

repeat.text: You will be moving between this room [point to room] and the lobby [point to lobby] many times during the study. [sorry gesture] Sorry in advance! [thank you gesture] Thanks, [goodbye wave] see you soon!

repeat.text: Please keep your [look down] head down and [close eyes] eyes closed during each trial until you [point to self] hear me say 'ok.'
